com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.animation

Class FadeOutUpBigTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.animation.Animation
      • javafx.animation.Transition
        • com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.animation.CachedTimelineTransition
          • com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.animation.FadeOutUpBigTransition

  • public class FadeOutUpBigTransition
extends CachedTimelineTransition
    Animate a fade out up big effect on a node Port of FadeOutUpBig from Animate.css by Dan Eden 
      @keyframes fadeOutUpBig {
        0% {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
        }
        100% {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-2000px);
        }
 }
    Since:
    2.0.0
